summary: Backend testing completed for PPTX Bilan Partenaire multi-programme fix and PDF Incident Report word wrap fix. Both critical bug fixes validated successfully.

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 error during one test run (likely network/timeout issue)

critical_code_review_comments: PPTX export function (lines 3871-4160): Indentation fix verified - all 3 slide creation blocks (Vue d'ensemble, Tests Sites, Tests Ligne) are now correctly inside the programme loop
PDF export function (lines 1688-1990): wordWrap='CJK' in cell_style ParagraphStyle correctly enables text wrapping for long points_attention content
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data (Azureva partenaire with 7 programmes, test_id 379a3e4a-9445-4545-93ac-45dc79da9fbc)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both bug fixes validated: 1) PPTX generates 21 slides for Azureva (7 programmes × 3 slides), 2) PDF word wrap working correctly with long points_attention text spanning 2 pages. Test file /app/tests/test_export_fixes.py can be reused for regression testing.
